article.title: Quantifying the Impact of Spectral Coverage on the Retrieval of Molecular Abundances from Exoplanet Transmission Spectra

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the y-axis of Figure 1 represent?
Which noise source dominates the total noise in both spectrograph models according to Figure 2?
What does Figure 3 illustrate about the authors\' radiometric instrument model?
choices: It struggles to accurately model water vapor features.
It accurately reproduces real-world observations of WASP-43b.
It underestimates the impact of stellar activity on transit depth.
It overestimates the atmospheric metallicity of WASP-43b.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the primary difference between Model A and Model B in Table 1?
